create_db module

create_db.connect_to_db()[source]
create_db.create_customers_table()[source]

Create the ‘customers’ table in the database if it does not exist.

create_db.create_inventory_table()[source]

Create the ‘inventory’ table in the database if it does not exist.

create_db.delete_customer(username)[source]

Delete a customer based on the provided username.

Parameters:

username (str) – The username of the customer to be deleted

Returns:

A message representing either the success or the failure of deletion

Return type:

str

create_db.delete_good(good_id)[source]

Delete a good based on the provided good_id.

Parameters:

good_id (str) – The good_id of the good to be deleted

Returns:

A message representing either the success or the failure of deletion

Return type:

str

create_db.get_customer_by_username(username)[source]

Retrieve customer information based on the provided username.

Parameters:

username (str) – The username of the customer

Returns:

A dictionary representing the customer if found, else None

Return type:

dict or None

create_db.get_customers()[source]

Retrieve a list of all customers.

Returns:

List of dictionaries, each representing a customer

Return type:

list

create_db.get_good_by_good_id(good_id)[source]

Retrieve good information based on the provided good_id.

Parameters:

good_id (str) – The good_id of the good

Returns:

A dictionary representing the good if found, else None

Return type:

dict or None

create_db.get_good_by_name(name)[source]

Retrieve a good with the given name.

Parameters:

name (str) – The name of the good

Returns:

A good with the given name

Return type:

dict or None

create_db.get_goods()[source]

Retrieve a list of all goods.

Returns:

List of dictionaries, each representing a good

Return type:

list

Insert a new customer into the database.

Parameters:

Returns:

A dictionary representing the inserted customer

Return type:

dict

Update customer information in the database.

Parameters:

A dictionary representing the updated customer

Return type:

dict
